channel.title: How do i make myself owner?
channel.description: how do i make myself owner?When my name comes up it says last connected for 127.0.0.1 what i change it to?and how do i change the server ip???????

item.title: How do i make myself owner?
item.dc:creator: @Gold_Light Gold Light
item.description:
@Gold_Light wrote:

go onin your server folder and go to characters open up your character and you will see
Player rights: you’ll see a 0 by it change it to 3 save it and log on the 127.0.0.1 is the host ip you’ll be connecting to that if your hosting the server if you wanna change it go into client.java in the client folder or GUI.java just click CTRL + F and search for 127.0.0.1 then change it to your ip.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself owner?
